p.br:
Sibley East will use this area on the website to provide resources and information regarding the district's Response to the COVID-19 Pandemic. Please see the links below for additional information.

Food Service Information Updated 4/20/2020
Beginning Wednesday, April 22, 2020, meals that need to be heated will be sent home to families. Information about preparing these meals can be found here.
Video by District Nurse Nancy Hislop on Wearing Face Masks
Click here to watch the video.
Prom & Other Events Update

p.span:
Sibley East has identified two possible dates for prom to possibly take place in the future (5/23/2020 & 6/13/2020). At this time, we are waiting for the guidance of the Minnesota Department of Health and the Minnesota Department of Education as to whether either of these dates will be possible. Please continue to check back for updates as this situation is fluid.
In addition, the district is waiting to make any announcements regarding other spring events that are currently scheduled for after May 5, 2020 until guidance is received from the Minnesota Department of Health and Minnesota Department of Education.
